NativeLibs4Java contains a few subprojects :

= Support sub-projects =

  * [http://code.google.com/p/jnaerator/ JNAerator] : see [http://code.google.com/p/jnaerator/wiki/CreditsAndLicense JNAerator's License / Credit info]
  * http://code.google.com/p/bridj/ BridJ] : see [http://code.google.com/p/bridj/wiki/CreditsAndLicense BridJ's License / Credit info]

= Bindings sub-projects =

  * [http://code.google.com/p/scalacl/ ScalaCL] : same license as BridJ (see [http://code.google.com/p/scalacl/wiki/FAQ ScalaCL's FAQ])
  * [http://code.google.com/p/javacl/ JavaCL] : the original JavaCL is under LGPL, and the BridJ port is under BSD license
  * FFMpeg, WinRAR, Mono, BeaEngine, PThread and OpenCV subprojects : each can be assumed to bear the same license as its target library, as they're mostly auto-generated bindings and hence can be considered to be derived works of the native libraries' headers
